item.title: Open vSwitch in NVIDIA BlueField SmartNIC
item.description: In embedded CPU (ECPF: Embedded CPU Physical Function) mode of NVIDIA BlueField DPU, Open vSwitch (OvS) is used for packet processing.

item.title: Configuring NVIDIA BlueField2 SmartNIC
item.description: SmartNIC is a new emerging hardware where a NIC with general-purpose CPU cores.
